overview: Ghosts, in the folklore of many cultures, are supposed spirits or souls. Traditionally they were believed to be images of deceased people, but the truth is that they can take different forms. Combining visual techniques such as Super-8 format and collage, "Mamuak" is a small audiovisual essay on the architectural and cultural changes that Bilbao has undergone, taking as a starting point the disappearance of the neighborhood movie theaters.
title: Ghosts
